summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackCurlsmith Bouncy Strength Volume Foam is a lightweight protein stylng foam for curls that provides soft hold and volume while enhancing your natural curl pattern.
details: DetailsBenefitsBoost strength and delivers extra volume. Ideal for light bouncy curls.Formulated with rice protein, designed to help strengthen the hairLight, long-lasting curl volume foamBest for weak, damaged hairPerfect for layering, it lets you customize your routine & use just the right amount of proteinFeaturesBEST FOR: Weak damaged hairFORMAT: Volume enhancing FoamHOLD LEVEL: 2- Invisible holdColor-SafeMade without sulphates, silicones or drying alcoholsItem 2643514How To UseApply to wet hair. Rake through to ensure you are evenly coating all strands. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.IngredientsWater (Aqua / Eau), Glycerin, VP/VA Copolymer, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Lentinus Edodes (Shiitake Mushroom) Extract*, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Fruit Extract, Opuntia Tuna Fruit Extract, Psidium Guajava Fruit Extract, Brassica Oleracea Acephala Leaf Extract, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin) Seed Extract*, Panthenol, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Hydrolyzed Hemp Seed Extract, Sodium Chloride, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Hydroxide, Laurtrimonium Chloride, Sodium Bisulfite, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Parfum / Fragrance, Limonene, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Geranyl Acetate, Dimethyl Phenethyl Acetate, Anethole, Linalool, Citrus Aurantium (Orange) Peel Oil.*Organic Ingredient
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Rake through to ensure you are evenly coating all strands. Style as desired and leave to air dry or diffuse.
